divs: sighting detailsat around 18:30 on the 15\4\12 i was sat looking out of the window at the clouds. when. i noticed a object appear from behind the clouds . it was shape like a sphere and seemed to be white and grey in color it moved ever so slowly and then stayed stationary for about 30seconds then began to move again behind a small grey cloud.from my house i was looking south west and as the object moved behind the cloud i also noticed a jet airliner traveling north but many thousands of feet higher . i stood waiting for the object to appear from behind the cloud again but it never came out and as the cloud started to disspurs the object had disappeared and this cloud was not large in diameter. i have waited all my life to see something like this and was unable to get a photograph which is very disappointing but what i saw i believe was real and like nothing i have ever seen before.
Summary: sat on couch looking out of window at clouds when object appeared from behind clouds moving slowly at first then stationary
trends: There has been one other sighting in Dewsbury
There were no other sightings in Dewsbury on or around April 15th 2012
